disclaimerText: This forecast is intended to provide information on expected pollution levels in areas of significant public exposure. It may not apply in very specific locations close to unusually strong or short-lived local sources of pollution.

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Thursday 12 May to end of Thursday 12 May GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: A mix of cloud with good sunny spells on Thursday.<br/><br/>A light westerly breeze expected to increase a little through the day. There should be good dispersion of any local emissions.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulate<br/>PM2.5 Particulate<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/><br/>

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Friday 13 May to end of Friday 13 May GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Some cloud early on Friday but clearing later.<br/><br/>A westerly breeze bringing 'clean' Atlantic air with good dispersion of any local emissions.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulate<br/>PM2.5 Particulate<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/><br/>
